H0.text: Hibernate in winter is what a bird builds a nest to do.

H1.text: Shelter its offspring is why a bird builds a nest.

H2.text: Produce more feathers is the purpose for which a bird builds a nest.

H3.text: Eliminate waste is the purpose for which a bird builds a nest.

A4.text: A bird nest is the spot in which a bird lays and incubates its eggs and raises its young.

A5.text: In constructing nests, birds act as ecosystem engineers by providing... a hibernation site... for invertebrates.
